resources.string: Are You sure You want to Sign out?
Contact permissions is required to Call. Requesting permission.
Read Contact permissions is required to fetch Contact List. Requesting permission.
Read Contact permissions is not granted. You can grant it from Settings >> Permissions
Contact permissions is not granted. You can grant it from Settings >> Permissions
Location permissions is not granted. You can grant it from Settings >> Permissions
Camera permissions is required for capturing pictures. Requesting permission.
Camera permissions is not granted. You can grant it from Settings >> Permissions
Storage permissions is required for accessing pictures. Requesting permission.
Storage permissions is not granted. You can grant it from Settings >> Permissions
Dont have an account? Sign Up
